text: The 1959/60 NTFL season was the 39th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). St Marys have won their fourth premiership title while defeating the Buffaloes in the grand final by 47 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | St Marys | 12.9 (81) - 5.4 (34) | Buffaloes (Darwin) |} == References == Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1959/60 NTFL season
